channel.title: Julia ~ The server for beginners [Final - Patch 1.0.1]
channel.description:
[center][size=28pt][b]Julia[/b][/size][/center] [center][size=16pt][b]The server for beginners.[/b][/size][/center]
[size=15pt][b]Introduction:[/b][/size] [spoiler] [b]Easily create the server you want without touching a line of code.[/b] The purpose of this project is creating your own base as beginner as simple as possible. There are a whole bunch of editors (see media and features) that make modifying this server to your liking very easy WITHOUT touching a single line of actual java code.
If you're a beginner in the rsps scene or just somebody who wants to make a base quickly without having to actual program, then this is for you. [/spoiler]
[size=15pt][b]Features:[/b][/size] [spoiler] I'm not going to drop a wall of text here as nobody reads it anyways. Just check out the media and you'll see what features are available.
Ok RandQm, but what is different in this version compared to the previous ones? [spoiler=this]
[ul][li]A whole bunch of bugs have been fixed from the previous versions.[/li] [li]Some beauty work:[/li] [list] [li] I added themes.[/li] [li]You can't open multiple instances of the same window anymore, it will jump to the front.[/li] [/list] [li]The code behind the search frame now works, so you can search items/shops/npcs that are in your server.[/li] [li]The shops editor has been expanded on supporting level requirements and points. (Though the points is kinda useless as you should write code on how to get the points, didn't think that one through.)[/li] [li]Scroll panes have been added to easily go through data in lists.[/li] [li]Readability has been improved e.g. 'ID 1333 - AMOUNT: 25' became 'Rune scimitar(1333), amount: 25'[/li] [li]Player manager has been reworked (codewise) for better updating, ban/mute etc.. didn't work correctly either which has been rewritten... but that belongs more under bug fixes. I guess.[/li] [li]About the data importer, though it's impossible to transfer data from somewhere else 100% correctly to this server, I optimized it a lot.[/li][/ul]
It's pretty much the final product of the goals I had for this project when I started it. [/spoiler] [/spoiler]
[size=15pt][b]Downloads:[/b][/size] [spoiler] [b]Source:[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/download/nlim1h7lk8ach65/Julia_1.0_(final).rar [b]Client:[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/download/tu1maiy806xi9di/A_Julia_Client.rar [b]Cache:[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/download/nfmrfifv2pz3767/Julia_cache.rar [b]Package:[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/download/k6nb1ppb8tn6p63/Julia_1.0_(final)_Package.rar [/spoiler]
[size=15pt][Color=navy][b]Patches:[/b][/color][/size] [spoiler]
[spoiler=Why patches?] The purpose of this project is that people don't need to touch code, so I will not post code fixes on the bugs. I could post a fixed version, but then you would again have to download a 15MB file. Instead I made a patcher, and will make more of them if bugs keep coming. [/spoiler]
[size=12pt][b]Released patches: [/b][/size]
[b]patch 1.0.1:[/b] [spoiler=patch 1.0.1] [i]Download link:[/i] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/3odhh7srhx385jn/Julia_Patch_1.0.1.rar]Julia Patch 1.0.1[/url] (125Kb) [spoiler=The changes in this patch]
[ul][li]Commands fixed, should all work now.[/li] [li]Points fixed (now saved to players account).[/li] [li]Points now actually work.[/li] [li]Item prize editing fixed, now edits the price correctly.[/li] [li]Shop item click & buying disconnections fixed.[/li][/ul]
[/spoiler] [/spoiler]
[b]patch 1.0.2:[/b] [spoiler=patch 1.0.1] [i]Download link:[/i] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/awx7mjoxwbtwp57/Julia_Patch_1.0.2.rar]Julia Patch 1.0.2[/url] (9Kb) [spoiler=The changes in this patch]
[ul][li]Banking fix (where items would turn into notes)[/li][/ul]
[/spoiler] [/spoiler]
[Spoiler=How to patch?] [I]I downloaded the source from my download link and let the patch run. It works fine, so if you have any issues you are doing something wrong![/I]
[b]Step 1:[/b] Extract the CONTENTS of 'Julia patch #.rar' into the MAIN directory of Julia. (This is the directory which contains the run.bat) [b]Step 2:[/b] Run 'Julia #.jar' and wait for a screen to pop up which says that Julia has been patched. And you're done! You can now delete the 'patch' folder and the 'Julia patch #' jar.
[SIZE=7pt]note: # stands for the patch number.[/SIZE] [/spoiler] [/spoiler]
[size=15pt][b]Media:[/b][/size] [spoiler] Client login screen: [img]http://i.imgur.com/36kjc14.png[/img]
Main screen + themes [img]http://i.imgur.com/Oy8k2ot.png[/img]
Search: [img]http://i.imgur.com/41Sz7st.png[/img]
Shops editor: [img]http://i.imgur.com/EdhuzYU.png[/img]
Shops editor (requirements toggled): [img]http://i.imgur.com/4vbEkdJ.png[/img]
Starter editor: [img]http://i.imgur.com/gBNFDqe.png[/img]
System update: [img]http://i.imgur.com/beGE6IY.png[/img]
Item definition editor: [img]http://i.imgur.com/z9CBAFZ.png[/img]
Item prizes: [img]http://i.imgur.com/NoDFwUd.png[/img]
Npc definition editor: [img]http://i.imgur.com/0fFYlIl.png[/img]
Npc drop editor: [img]http://i.imgur.com/hIwt6CF.png[/img]
Npc spawn editor: [img]http://i.imgur.com/VYlDatO.png[/img]
Player manager: [img]http://i.imgur.com/HkYbjSa.png[/img]
Properties: [img]http://i.imgur.com/7ZovjJq.png[/img]
Server message: [img]http://i.imgur.com/CXcgPpu.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[size=15pt][b]Game content:[/b][/size] [spoiler] Everything has been written around this base, so it also contains ALL the content of that base. Find everything you want to know here: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,602096.msg4220286.html#msg4220286 [/spoiler]
[spoiler=notes] - This is the final version of Julia. I plan on expanding the project and rework the base to be not only better but also to offer support for more editing, though I have less time atm so don't expect it soon.
- If you find any bugs please notice me of them.
- For help on using this server/client, read the guide in one of the posts below. [/spoiler]

item.title: Julia ~ The server for beginners [Final - Patch 1.0.1]
item.dc:creator: @Deadforce Deadforce
item.description:
@Deadforce wrote:

Okay, since the item definitons does not save when closed, how would i make items stack manually? currently all runes (item codes: 555 556 557 558 554) and stuff like hand cannon shots, etc. do not stack. If you do ::item 555 28 you will get a full inventory of water runes. Same with a bunch of different items.

What/Where could i go to manually make the items stackable?

EDIT: I Have found this? its in Items.java, how shall i go about proceeding with making items stackable?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

[quote=“ju1tin, post:33, topic:545950”]“Error Connecting to Server”

Change the ips in Client.java and compiled but still didnt work

Someone help please?[/quote][quote=“7mody123, post:34, topic:545950”]theres a proplem with java loading help me please I DID WHAT U SAY PUTTED THE CACHE ON THE C DRIVE AND COMPILED IT STILL ERRO IM USING JDK1.8.0_25[/quote]

Post some code so we can see where you are going wrong.

@RQ this is great that you go out of your way to make things really simple for those starting out. Wish I had something like this. Are you going to expand it feature by feature?

I think basic compiling and runtime issues are a major barrier for newcomers. Maybe add a FAQ or something more indepth, if you plan on creating more versions. This is epic if it can be the answer to every newcomer’s problem. Unfortunately not.

Read full topic

item.title: Julia ~ The server for beginners [Final - Patch 1.0.1]
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:7, topic:545950”]The purpose of this project is that people don’t need to touch code, so I will not post code fixes on the bugs.
I could post a fixed version, but then you would again have to download a 15MB file.
Instead I made a patcher, and will make more of them if bugs keep coming.

[B]You can download patch 1.0.1 here:[/B] Julia Patch 1.0.1 (125Kb)

[size=12pt][COLOR=red][B]HowTo:[/B][/COLOR][/size]
[I]I downloaded the source from my download link and let the patch run. It works fine, so if you have any issues you are doing something wrong![/I]

Step 1: Extract the CONTENTS of ‘Julia patch 1.0.1.rar’ into the MAIN directory of Julia. (This is the directory which contains the run.bat)
Step 2: Run ‘Julia 1.0.1.jar’ and wait for a screen to pop up which says that Julia has been patched.
And you’re done! You can now delete the ‘patch’ folder and the ‘Julia patch 1.0.1’ jar.

Below fixes will be applied after patching:

[spoiler=The changes in this patch]

[ul][]Commands fixed, should all work now.
[]Points fixed (now saved to players account).
[]Points now actually work.
[]Item prize editing fixed, now edits the price correctly.
[*]Shop item click & buying disconnections fixed.[/ul]

[/spoiler][/quote]

why don’t you just use lovely tools such as diff and patch like any regular, sane human being?

Read full topic
item.source: Julia ~ The server for beginners [Final - Patch 1.0.1]

item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

johnathan:

please tell me how to run julias client once downloaded all the files and to open it up and start playing

[quote=“RandQm, post:7, topic:545950”]The purpose of this project is that people don’t need to touch code, so I will not post code fixes on the bugs.
I could post a fixed version, but then you would again have to download a 15MB file.
Instead I made a patcher, and will make more of them if bugs keep coming.

[B]You can download patch 1.0.1 here:[/B] Julia Patch 1.0.1 (125Kb)

[size=12pt][COLOR=red][B]HowTo:[/B][/COLOR][/size]
[I]I downloaded the source from my download link and let the patch run. It works fine, so if you have any issues you are doing something wrong![/I]

Step 1: Extract the CONTENTS of ‘Julia patch 1.0.1.rar’ into the MAIN directory of Julia. (This is the directory which contains the run.bat)
Step 2: Run ‘Julia 1.0.1.jar’ and wait for a screen to pop up which says that Julia has been patched.
And you’re done! You can now delete the ‘patch’ folder and the ‘Julia patch 1.0.1’ jar.

Below fixes will be applied after patching:

[spoiler=The changes in this patch]

[ul][]Commands fixed, should all work now.
[]Points fixed (now saved to players account).
[]Points now actually work.
[]Item prize editing fixed, now edits the price correctly.
[*]Shop item click & buying disconnections fixed.[/ul]

[/spoiler][/quote]

[quote author=RandQm link=topic=664842.msg4444584#msg4444584 date=1408120655]
This is how it should look:

Run the jar from there.

patch 1.0.2:
[spoiler=patch 1.0.1]
Download link: Julia Patch 1.0.2 (9Kb)
[spoiler=The changes in this patch]

[ul][li]Banking fix (where items would turn into notes)[/li][/ul]

[/spoiler]
